content: My system follows Privacy by Design Principles sufficient to support compliance with the privacy policies in which it is implemented.
why both resources? where do we define what an "Accounting of Disclosure" is?
My system sends an Accounting of Disclosure to the consenter as requested when permitted actions on resources are performed using a FHIR AuditEvent or Provenance Resource
@John Moehrke, @Alexander Mense I am processing the proposed updates to the safety checklist, and I have a number of questions
what's the point of this? It's not really a meaningful statement
